articles.title: Nasdaq futures jump more than 1% on Meta surge, Fed relief - Reuters
articles.description: Nasdaq futures jumped on Thursday as Meta Platforms surged after announcing rigorous cost controls, while a dovish message from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell boosted bets of a softer landing for the U.S. economy.
